summary.span: 为在工作流设计图面上具有顺序垂直布局的所有活动设计器定义属性和方法。

span.span: Defines properties and methods for all activity designers that have a sequential vertical layout on the workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 和从它继承的类可以包含子活动设计器。The and classes that inherit from it can contain child activity designers. 它们在工作流设计图面上的外观以垂直方式组织，子活动显示在 的图面上。Their appearance on the workflow design surface is organized vertically, with child activities displayed on the surface of the .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 返回 `true`，则设计器在工作流设计图面上呈现一个展开-折叠按钮。If returns `true`, the designer renders an expand-collapse button on the workflow design surface. 如果 的父设计器为 ，则 将返回 `false`。If the parent designer of the is , returns `false`. 另外，如果 是根设计器，则 将返回 `false`。Additionally, if the is the root designer, returns `false`.

summary.span: 返回限定了活动设计器的连接器边界的矩形的数组。

span.span: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.

returns.span: 限定连接器边界的 数组。

span.span: The array that bounds the connectors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前设计器不是有效的设计器或者设计器未展开，则 返回一个空数组。If the current designer is not the active designer or if the designer is not expanded, returns an empty array. 如果在父设计器中没有活动设计器，则 返回一个包含一个矩形的数组。If there are no activity designers in the parent designer, returns an array of one rectangle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo HitTest(valuetype System.Drawing.Point point) cil managed

param.name: point
param.span: 工作流设计图面上要从该处收集信息的 位置。

span.span: The location on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.

summary.span: 返回有关工作流设计图面上指定点处的 的信息。

span.span: Returns information about the at the specified point on the workflow design surface.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含有关 的信息。

span.span: A that contains information about the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 返回的信息基于传递给它的工作流设计图面上的点。The information returned by is based on the point on the workflow design surface that was passed to it. 它包括与该点关联的活动设计器、该活动设计器的边界、该点的确切命中位置、所有与该点关联的可选择对象和所有与该点关联的用户数据。It includes the activity designer associated with the point, the bounds of that activity designer, the exact hit location of the point, any selectable objects associated with the point, and any user data associated with the point.
